definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
who would have thought that/who would have expected that

sentences.english: The true feelings reveal, here two are redundant is how could it not be more moving? Also for example.
sentences.chinese: 真情流露，這裏的兩個重複豈不更令人感動？又如。

sentences.english: Is there iniquity in my tongue?
This makes as little sense as transiting Penghu to fly from Taipei to Kaohsiung.
sentences.chinese: 豈不正如自臺北到高雄，命其須在澎湖中轉？

sentences.english: B: In this case, there might be more reasons.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話，原因豈不就是多方面的了。

sentences.english: Have I any pleasure at all that the wicked should die?
sentences.chinese: 主耶和華說，惡人死亡，豈是我喜悅的嗎。

sentences.english: If a man owns a hundred sheep, and one of them wanders away, will he not leave the ninety-nine on the hills and go to look for the one that wandered off?
sentences.chinese: 他豈不撇下這九十九隻，往山裏去找那隻迷路的羊麼。

sentences.english: is it not in your eyes in comparison of it as nothing?
sentences.chinese: 豈不在眼中看如無有嗎。

sentences.english: Cor. 3:1 Are we beginning again to commend ourselves?
sentences.chinese: 林後三1我們豈是又開始推薦自己麼？

sentences.english: How shall the ministry of the Spirit not be more in glory?
sentences.chinese: 何況那靈的職事，豈不更帶着榮光？

sentences.english: Shall evil be recompensed for good? for they have digged a pit for my soul.
sentences.chinese: 豈可以惡報善呢？他們竟挖坑要害我的性命。

sentences.english: Is it for bowing his head like a rush And for spreading out sackcloth and ashes as his bed?
sentences.chinese: 豈是叫人垂頭像葦子，用麻布和爐灰當牀鋪麼？

sentences.english: Gavest thou the goodly wings unto the peacocks? or wings and feathers unto the ostrich?
sentences.chinese: 鴕鳥的翅膀歡然搧展，豈是顯慈愛的翎毛和羽毛麼？

sentences.english: Is it such a fast that I have chosen?
sentences.chinese: 這樣禁食，豈是我所揀選使人刻苦己心的日子嗎。

sentences.english: Are the trees of the field people, that you should besiege them?
sentences.chinese: 田間的樹木豈是人，叫你糟蹋嗎？

sentences.english: O house of Israel, are not my ways equal?
sentences.chinese: 以色列家阿，我的道豈不公平嗎。

sentences.english: An fatal take place at this cross three years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這個睡字賂口三年前發生濾一豈死亡事故。

definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
